description: This module covers key aspects of strategic communication, to be planned, implemented, and evaluated in global contexts. Students will examine the dynamism of strategic and global communication by corporate, governmental, and civil society organisations at regional, national and transnational levels. Students also explore the integration of multiple forms of public communication, including advertising, branding, public relations, and social media advocacy, for both public- and private-sector initiatives. Upon completing this module, students will have knowledge and skills for developing integrated strategic campaigns involving a range of media and communication activities with global reach and worldwide impact.
title: Strategic and Global Communication
